overview_of_class: Continuation of 281-1.  Vector integral calculus, differential equations, infinite series.  Open only to students in ISP.
name: Accelerated Mathematics for ISP: First Year
title: WCAS MATH 281-2-51 Accelerated Mathematics for ISP: First Year

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Continuation of 281-1. Vector integral calculus, differential equations, infinite series. Open only to students in ISP.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
281-1 or permission of instructor.
Must be enrolled as a first year in ISP.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Divergence Theorem, Stoke's Theorem, Ordinary Differential Equations

descriptions.value:

Boyce and DiPrima
Wiley
